title: Optimizing mycorrhizal fungi application for improved nutrient uptake, growth, and disease resistance in cardamom seedlings (Elettaria cardamomum (L.) Maton)
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Sarathambal Chinnathambi, Mohammed Faisal Peeran, Veeraraghavan Srinivasan, Sivasankaran Mukesh Sankar, Priya George
